channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【GPT-5 Now Available in Visual Studio】GPT-5现在在Visual Studio中可用
item.description: 【We’re excited to share that GPT-5, OpenAI’s latest frontier model, is now rolling out in GitHub Copilot for Visual Studio. GPT-5 offers faster responses and even better performance for writing and understanding code. This release brings a new level of capability to】我们很高兴分享Openai最新的Frontier模型GPT-5现在正在Github Copilot上推出Visual Studio。 GPT-5提供更快的响应，甚至可以更好地理解代码。此版本带来了新的能力

item.title: 【Azure Managed Instance for Apache Cassandra v5.0 Generally Available!】Apache Cassandra v5.0的Azure托管实例通常可用！
【.NET 10 Preview 7 is now available!】.NET 10预览7现在可用！
item.description: 【Today, we are excited to announce the seventh preview release of .NET 10 with enhancements across the .NET Runtime, SDK, libraries, C#, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, .NET MAUI, and more. Check out the full release notes linked below and get started today. [cta-button align="center" text="Download .NET 10 Preview 7" url="https://get】今天，我们很高兴宣布.NET 10的第七次预览版本，并在.NET运行时，SDK，库，C＃，ASP.NET Core，Blazor，.Net Maui等增强功能。查看下面链接的完整发行说明，并立即开始。 [cta button align =“中心” text =“下载.net 10预览7” url =“ https：//获取

item.title: 【PowerToys 0.93 is here: faster Command Palette, new dashboard UX and more】PowerToys 0.93在这里：更快的命令调色板，新仪表板UX等
【Go 1.25.0-1 Microsoft build now available】现在可用1.25.0-1 Microsoft构建

item.title: 【From Redmond to San Diego: VS Live! Highlights, Session Examples, and What’s Next】从雷德蒙德到圣地亚哥：vs Live！亮点，会话示例以及下一步
item.description: 【There’s something special about hosting developers at Microsoft HQ — and this year’s Visual Studio Live! Redmond reminded me why I love these events. The energy in every room was electric. From the moment the first session kicked off, developers leaned in, asked smart, challenging questions, and took every opportunity to connect with the】在Microsoft HQ托管开发人员以及今年的Visual Studio Live有一些特别之处！雷德蒙德提醒我为什么我喜欢这些事件。每个房间的能量都是电的。从第一届会议开始的那一刻起，开发人员就倾斜，问聪明，具有挑战性的问题，并借此机会与

item.title: 【Azure DevOps OAuth Client Secrets Now Shown Only Once】Azure Devops Oauth客户秘密现在仅显示一次
item.description: 【We’re making an important change to how Azure DevOps displays OAuth client secrets to align with industry best practices and improve our overall security posture. Starting September, newly generated client secrets will be shown only once at the time of creation. After that, they will no longer be retrievable via the UI or】我们正在对Azure DevOps如何显示Oauth客户的秘密以与行业最佳实践保持一致并改善我们的整体安全姿势的重要性。从9月开始，新生成的客户秘密将在创建时仅显示一次。之后，它们将不再通过UI检索或

item.title: 【Hunting Living Secrets: Secret Validity Checks Arrive in GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps】狩猎生活秘密：秘密有效性检查到达Github Advance for Azure Devops
item.description: 【If you’ve ever waded through a swamp of secret scanning alerts wondering, “Which of these are actually dangerous right now?” — this enhancement is for you. Secret validity checks in GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps (and the standalone Secret Protection experience) add a high‑signa】如果您曾经涉足过一大堆秘密扫描警报的沼泽，他们想知道：“现在哪一个实际上是危险的？” - 这种增强是给您的。 github的Azure DevOps（以及独立的秘密保护体验）中的GitHub Advanced Securiti

item.title: 【Azure Developer CLI: From Dev to Prod with Azure DevOps Pipelines】Azure开发人员CLI：从DEV到使用Azure DevOps Pipelines
item.description: 【Building on our previous post about implementing dev-to-prod promotion with GitHub Actions, this follow-up demonstrates the same "build once, deploy everywhere" pattern using Azure DevOps Pipelines. You'll learn how to leverage Azure Dev】在我们以前关于通过GitHub Action实施Dev-to-to-to促销的文章的基础上，此后续措施使用Azure DevOps管道展示了相同的“构建一次，在任何地方部署”模式。您将学习如何利用Azure Dev

item.title: 【Thoughts on creating a tracking pointer class, part 3: Using a std::vector】关于创建跟踪指针类的想法，第3部分：使用 std :: vector
item.description: 【Last time, we tried to build our "tracking pointers" out of nodes in a std::list, but we found that the std::list was not expressive enough to support the operations we needed.¹ So instea】上次，我们试图从std ::列表中的节点中构建“跟踪指针”，但我们发现std ::列表的表现不足以支持我们需要的操作。
